page.title: 18Government
page.content: Six members serve 3 years on the Parish Council, meeting every 3 months. 11 local parishes form a District Council. Councillors serve four years and meet every 2 months at Council Offices, Manby. County Councillors are elected 3 yearly meet monthly at Lincoln (and represent a wider area). Members of Parliament elected for 5 years, representing about 50,000 voters, meet in the House of Commons. A European Member of Parliament elected for 5 years to sit in Brussels as part of the European Economic Community. Locally the political parties are Conservative and Liberal with the former holding the mandate.
